remarks:
2013-Sep-13 16:58:24 by adesmet: 
wget ftp://ftp.cs.wisc.edu/condor/contrib/dmtcp_condor_integration-0.6-Any-Any.tar.gz
tar xvzf dmtcp_condor_integration-*.tar.gz
rm dmtcp_condor_integration-*.tar.gz


wget 'http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/dmtcp/dmtcp/1.2.8/dmtcp-1.2.8.tar.gz?r=http%3A%2F%2Fsourceforge.net%2Fprojects%2Fdmtcp%2Ffiles%2Fdmtcp%2F&ts=1377098295&use_mirror=hivelocity'
tar xvzf dmtcp-*.tar.gz
rm dmtcp-*.tar.gz

pushd dmtcp-*
./configure --prefix=/scratch/adesmet/dmtcp-test-2/install
make && make install
popd

tar xvzf /p/condor/public/binaries/v8.0/8.0.1/condor-8.0.1-x86_64_RedHat6-stripped.tar.gz
pushd condor-*
./condor_install --make-personal-condor
source condor.sh
condor_master
popd

pushd dmtcp_condor_integration-*
EDIT Makefile - Set DMTCP_INSTALL correctly
make
EDIT job.sub - Change ckptint to 60

2013-Sep-17 15:46:51 by pfc:
Per the Condor call today, the ball is now in Kent's court to try to reproduce Alan's success. If Kent still sees failures, then Alan will schedule a screen-share to debug live together with Kent.

2013-Nov-22 14:01:42 by pfc:
Closing this for now; KVM checkpointing looks much more promising. Will reopen only if KVM checkpointing doesn't work out for some reason.
